main.name: Abhirup Basu
main.description: Proficient in TypeScript, React.js, Node.js and Next.js
main.bio: As a self-taught web developer with roots in Applied Geology, I have been captivated by technology since my M.Sc. thesis, focused on GIS-based Satellite Image Processing. Over the past three years, I've developed user-centric web experiences, specializing in TypeScript, React.js, and Node.js. This journey has granted me a diverse perspective, allowing for creative and user-focused problem-solving. I am passionate about creating solutions that are not only functional but also accessible and engaging.
main.contactmessage: Feel free to reach out to discuss exciting opportunities or collaborations!

education.description: Graduated with a CGPA of 9.40 out of 10
Graduated with a CGPA of 8.35 out of 10

work.title: Freelance Web Developer
work.description: Developed an AI-powered newsletter application (News AI) and provided technical support for the chatbot application Botgo. Worked on interactive, mobile-responsive websites for various clients.

work.title: React Developer
work.description: Developed a production-level AI-powered chatbot platform (Botgo) and a client dashboard for chatbot customization. Led a team of 4 junior frontend developers, providing mentorship and code reviews.

work.title: React Developer
work.description: Worked on the frontend development and maintenance of web applications for the automotive and healthcare industries.

testimonials.text: Abhirup's expertise in frontend development and his mentorship skills were instrumental in our project success. Highly recommend!
testimonials.user: Project Manager at Globtier Infotech Pvt. Ltd.

testimonials.text: Working with Abhirup was a pleasure. His skills in React and frontend development are top-notch.
